item.title: Custom firmware for Rapsberry Pi 3 using buildroot
item.author: Maki
item.description: I. Step 1 In this first part, we had to set up the buildroot system basis. Goals of this part are: Minimal buildroot configuration Copy the new firmware on RPi SD card I.1. Base system specification After downloaded the last release of buildroot, I prepared the build for Raspberry Pi 3 architecture. 1 make raspberrypi3_defconfig In this interface “menuconfig”, I have to initiate the RAM filesystem: 1 Filesystem images → initial RAM filesystem linked into linux kernel Furthermore, as we can see in the picture above, I disabled the ext3/4 filesystem, it’s not necessary here.
